title: Market Segmentation Drill-Down
description: Identify and prioritize the most promising customer segments for a given product or service.

title: SWOT Synthesis for Board Deck
description: Create a concise, visually-ready SWOT analysis for executive presentations.

title: Customer Journey Blueprint
description: Map a detailed end-to-end customer journey and pinpoint key improvement opportunities.

title: Value Proposition Canvas Generator
description: Produce a complete Value Proposition Canvas aligned to a target segment.
promptText:
You are facilitating a value proposition workshop.

Provide:
1. Target segment description: {{segment}}
2. Product/Service overview: {{offer}}

Build a Value Proposition Canvas with sections:
• Customer Jobs (functional, social, emotional)
• Pains
• Gains
• Pain Relievers
• Gain Creators
• Product & Services list

Use clear bullets under each heading and ensure direct alignment between pains/gains and corresponding relievers/creators.

title: Competitive Landscape Radar
description: Create a radar chart-ready dataset comparing the client to key competitors on critical dimensions.
promptText:
Act as a competitive intelligence analyst.

Inputs:
• Client name: {{client}}
• List of competitors: {{competitors}}
• Evaluation dimensions: {{dimensions}} (e.g., price, innovation, UX, brand strength, distribution)

Produce:
A JSON object with a list of entities (client + competitors) and numeric scores 1-10 for each dimension, suitable for plotting a radar chart. Summarize major competitive gaps in 3 bullets.

title: Growth Strategy Roadmap
description: Outline a 12-month growth roadmap with prioritized initiatives and KPIs.

title: Pricing Strategy Simulator
description: Recommend optimal price points based on elasticity and competitor benchmarks.

title: Business Model Stress-Test
description: Evaluate resilience of a business model under macro and competitive shocks.

title: Stakeholder Alignment Workshop Plan
description: Design a half-day workshop agenda to align cross-functional stakeholders on a new initiative.

title: OKR Set Drafting Assistant
description: Generate draft OKRs that tie directly to strategic priorities and are measurable.

title: Idea Prioritization Matrix Builder
description: Score and rank a backlog of ideas using Impact vs. Effort (ICE) or RICE methodology.

title: ESG Impact Report Synthesizer
description: Generate an executive summary of a company's annual ESG report with key metrics and recommendations.
promptText:
Act as an ESG analyst.

Input: Full ESG report text (or link) ➔ {{esg_report}}

Deliverable:
• 3-paragraph executive summary (Environmental, Social, Governance highlights).
• A bullet list of the 5 most material risks/opportunities.
• Two high-level improvement actions for next fiscal year.

title: Product Feature Kano Analyzer
description: Classify proposed features into Must-Have, Performance, and Delight using Kano analysis.

title: Investor Pitch Deck Skeleton
description: Draft a 10-slide seed-stage pitch deck outline tailored to a specific investor persona.

title: Organizational Capability Gap Analyzer
description: Compare current vs. required capabilities and highlight gaps with mitigation options.
promptText:
You are an org-design consultant.

Inputs:
- Current capability map (JSON): {{current_caps}}
- Target capability map (JSON): {{target_caps}}

Tasks:
1. Identify missing or under-developed capabilities.
2. For each gap propose Build, Buy, or Partner options with timeline and cost range.
3. Summarize in a table and add a short narrative on change-management implications.

title: Brand Voice Style-Guide Generator
description: Produce a concise style guide that defines brand tone, vocabulary, and sample messaging dos & don'ts.
promptText:
You are a brand strategist.

Provide:
• Brand archetype & values: {{archetype}}
• Target audience: {{audience}}

Output sections:
1. Voice & Tone Principles (3-5 bullets)
2. Approved Vocabulary & Phrases
3. Words/Phrases to Avoid
4. Example transformation of a bland sentence into brand-aligned copy.

title: Change Management Comms Calendar
description: Create a week-by-week communication plan for a major transformation program.

title: Supply-Chain Risk Heat-Map Creator
description: Assess and visualize supplier risks along probability vs. impact dimensions.
promptText:
You are a supply-chain risk analyst.

Input CSV: Supplier, Country, Risk Events Last 3y, Criticality Score

Tasks:
1. Compute Probability and Impact scores (1-5) using given formulas or assumptions provided under {{assumptions}}.
2. Return JSON with coordinates for plotting a heat-map and list top 5 high-risk suppliers with mitigation suggestions.

title: UX Heuristic Review Checklist Prompt
description: Generate a heuristics-based usability checklist tailored to a digital product type.

title: Concept Mood-Board Visual Prompt
description: Generate an image prompt for a visual AI to create a brand mood-board with specified vibes.
